content: @brandibuzzard I just want the alternative proteins to be labeled for what they are and not called meat ie almond milk unless they are regulated the same as our protein

@BeltwayBeef @GranerKenny @USDA @BeltwayBeef So lets be completely clear. Does NCBA feel lab grown alternative protein ( fake meat) should be labeled meat or beef? Or should that label be solely used by animals raised and harvested in a traditional manner? Clarify please.
